channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ian McKellen to star as LS Lowry in documentary revealing trove of unheard tapes

item.title: US appeals court reverses decision that freed Mahmoud Khalil from ICE detention
item.description: Ruling delivers victory to Trump administration in its efforts to deport the pro-Palestinian activist A federal appeals court on Thursday reversed a l...

item.title: Dutch far-right activist Eva Vlaardingerbroek appears to lose right to UK visa-free travel

item.title: Trump threatens to invoke Insurrection Act over protests in Minneapolis – US politics live

item.title: G7 threatens more sanctions for Iran amid ’high level of reported deaths and injuries’ - live
item.description: G7 members ‘remain prepared to impose additional restrictive measures if Iran continues to crack down on protests and dissent’ Trump has told Reuters ...

item.title: Iran judiciary denies plan to execute detained protester Erfan Soltani
item.description: The judiciary says Soltani is not facing charges carrying the death penalty, while a rights group reports that the execution has been "postponed".

item.title: England face prop shortage as Opoku-Fordjour ruled out of Six Nations
item.description: England's front-row stocks take a hit as prop Asher Opoku-Fordjour is ruled out of the Six Nations with a shoulder injury.

item.title: Rival chip shop-owning brothers call each night 'to see who's taken the most'
item.description: Emir and Ouday Hikary's south Wales businesses have both made the top 10 UK takeaways.

item.title: Rejections, depression & promise to his mum - Thiago's route to top

item.title: Millions of people to see their local council elections delayed
item.description: Most wanting a delay are Labour-led but two are Tory councils and one is a Lib Dem authority.
